task.title: Install Atom
task.shortdesc: Step-by-step instructions to install Atom on your computer.

taskbody.context: Atom is a free, open source text editor developed by GitHub. For Mac users, Atom may be a good alternative to Notepad ++.

step.cmd: Go to . Above Download you should see listed your computer's specific operating system (OS) and version.
step.stepxmp: For example, if you have a computer running Windows 10, you will see the image below. Atom Download

step.cmd: If the the OS/version information is correct for your computer, click Download and follow the on-screen instructions to complete the installation. If the OS/version information is not correct or you want to download Atom for a different operating system, follow these steps:

substep.cmd: On the bottom left of the screen, click Other platforms. You will be taken to Atom's latest version release page on GitHub. You can also get there by clicking this link:
Click Assets to open the list of the current OS versions available to download.
To download, click on the appropriate file name for your platform.
Open the downloaded file and follow the on-screen installation instructions.
